Marvel Girl (Marvel)(Ultimate)
Real Name: Jean Karen Grant Grey
Search for 'Marvel Girl (Marvel)(Ultimate)' on Amazon

Powers:
Jean Grey is a developing telepath with varying telekinetic and telepathic abilities.

Bio:
Jean's parents are former members of the Church of Shi'ar Enlightenment. Her former lover is Wolverine and current boyfriend is Cyclops. Acts as co-headmistress of Xavier's school and regularly suffers from imaginary images, such as little green goblin creatures crawling all over her body and a fragment of the Phoenix Force.

Notes:
While some characters that appeared in Ultimate Marvel Team-Up may act inconsistently from their other, later appearances, The Official Handbook of the Ultimate Marvel Universe: Ultimate Spider-Man/Ultimate Fantastic Four 2005 #1 confirms this character's appearance to be in-continuity.

The Ultimate version of this character is not an alternate identity of the regular Marvel character as the Ultimate universe is a distinct reality. See here for more information. In the series "Ultimate X", Jean is in hiding and adopts the name Karen Grant.

First Appearance: Ultimate X-Men (2001) #1

Favorite Characters:
Marvel Girl (Marvel)(Ultimate) is a favorite character of 2 users
